articles.author: Tobi Raji
articles.title: 15 dead after new Ebola outbreak in the Democratic Republic of Congo - The Washington Post
articles.description: Health officials have recorded at least 28 suspected cases amid the central African nation’s 16th outbreak of the deadly disease.
articles.content: At least 15 people from the Democratic Republic of Congo, including four health care workers, died following a new outbreak of the Ebola virus, the central African nations 16th major brush with the d… [+57 chars]
